name: Terrain Toolbox
description:
{ For GMTK Jam 2022 }

Terrain Toolbox is an easy and fast world generation simulation! Create completely new and random worlds at the roll of a dice!

This software uses the diamond-square algorithm to randomly render perlin noise into seperate seed maps of position, temperature, humidity, and elevation that combine together to create a completely unique procedurally generated biome world! :D

On the main menu, you can choose the size of the world (1x), (2x), (3x), & (4x). I HIGHLY recommend keeping it at the default size (1x) as larger the land is, the longer it takes to load.

To relate to the theme, the output of a dice roll is random every single time, and so is the output of this generation simulation! I was able to make and polish this game as much as I could in only a single day!

CONTROLS:  mouse

  • Hover over any area with your mouse pointer to check its temperature, humidity, elevation, and biome (at the top of the screen)!
  • Use the scroll wheel to zoom in/out.
  • When zoomed in, left click and drag to move the camera around.
  • When you're done, right click to go back to the main menu and generate a new world!

If you discover any cool or wacky worlds then feel free to screenshot them and tweet with #terraintoolbox :)
